verses.verse: Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and all the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, which is <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

And all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast<s%>, in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H388>Ethanim<s%>, which is the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
And all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And they brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and all the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were in the <S%H168>Tent<s%>; even these did the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> bring <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> unto <S%H6440>him<s%>, were with him before the <S%H727>ark<s%>, <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, that could not be <S%H5608>counted<s%> nor <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto its <S%H4725>place<s%>, into the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, to the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3671>place<s%>, even under the wings of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>.

For the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> over the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof <S%H4605>above<s%>.

And the <S%H905>staves<s%> were so <S%H748>long<s%> that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>staves<s%> were seen <S%H7200>from<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle<s%>; but they were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>: and there they are unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

There was nothing in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7535>save<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3240>put<s%> there at <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3548>pass<s%>, when the priests were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6051>place<s%>, that the cloud <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

so that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>; for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Then <S%H559>spake<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%>.
I have <S%H1129>surely<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> thee a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2073>habitation<s%>, a <S%H4349>place<s%> for thee to dwell <S%H2073>in<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who <S%H1696>spake<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and hath with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> <S%H559>it<s%>, saying,

Since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, I <S%H977>chose<s%> no <S%H5892>city<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%>, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might be <S%H977>there<s%>; but I chose <S%H1732>David<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Now it was in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H3282>Whereas<s%> it was in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, thou didst <S%H2895>well<s%> that it was in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>:

nevertheless <S%H7535><s%> thou shalt not <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>; but thy <S%H1121>son<s%> that shall come forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of thy <S%H2504>loins<s%>, he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6965>established<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> that he <S%H1696>spake<s%>; for I am risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in the room of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%>, and have <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And there have I <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%>, wherein is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, when he brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the presence <S%H5048>of<s%> all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>;

and he <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, there is no <S%H430>God<s%> like <S%H8064>thee<s%>, in heaven <S%H4605>above<s%>, or on <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8104>beneath<s%>; who keepest <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee with all their <S%H3820>heart<s%>;

who hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that which thou didst <S%H1696>promise<s%> <S%H1696>him<s%>: yea, thou spakest with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and hast <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Now <S%H3068>therefore<s%>, O Jehovah, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8104>keep<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that which thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7535>if<s%> only thy <S%H1121>children<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H1870>way<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me as thou hast <S%H1980>walked<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>.

Now <S%H430>therefore<s%>, O God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, let thy <S%H1697>word<s%>, I pray <S%H539>thee<s%>, be verified, which thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>.

But will <S%H430>God<s%> in very <S%H552>deed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H8064>behold<s%>, heaven and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> cannot <S%H3557>contain<s%> <S%H637>thee<s%>; how much less this <S%H1004>house<s%> that I have <S%H1129>builded<s%>!

Yet have thou <S%H6437>respect<s%> unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and to his <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>;

that thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day<s%>, even toward the <S%H4725>place<s%> whereof thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8085>there<s%>; to hearken unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And <S%H8085>hearken<s%> thou to the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>: <S%H8085>yea<s%>, hear thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> - <S%H4725>place<s%>; and when thou <S%H8085>hearest<s%>, <S%H5545>forgive<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and an <S%H423>oath<s%> be <S%H5375>laid<s%> upon him to cause him to <S%H422>swear<s%>, and he <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H423>swear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H4196>altar<s%> in this <S%H1004>house<s%>;

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H8199>judge<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H7561>condemning<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, to <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

When thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are smitten <S%H5062>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H7725>thee<s%>; if they turn again to <S%H3034>thee<s%>, and confess thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> unto thee in this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H127>land<s%> which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

When <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is shut <S%H6113>up<s%>, and there is no <S%H4306>rain<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H6419>thee<s%>; if they pray toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H2403>sin<s%>, when thou dost afflict <S%H6031>them<s%>:

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when thou <S%H3384>teachest<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein they should <S%H3212>walk<s%>; and <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> upon thy <S%H776>land<s%>, which thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> to thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

If there be in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%>, if there be <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, if there be <S%H7711>blasting<s%> or <S%H3420>mildew<s%>, <S%H697>locust<s%> or <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%>; if their <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H6887>besiege<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H8179>cities<s%>; whatsoever <S%H5061>plague<s%>, whatsoever sickness there <S%H4245>be<s%>;

what <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8467>supplication<s%> soever be made by any <S%H120>man<s%>, or by all thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who shall <S%H3045>know<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of his own <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> - <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H5414>render<s%> unto every <S%H376>man<s%> according to all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>; (for <S%H3045>thou<s%>, even thou only, knowest the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>;)
that they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee all the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6440>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Moreover concerning the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%>, that is not of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when he shall come <S%H935>out<s%> of a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H4616>for<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake

(for they shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, and of thy <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and of thine <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>); when he shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%>;

hear <S%H8085><s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> - <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> <S%H7121>calleth<s%> to thee <S%H5971>for<s%>; that all the peoples of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H5971>thee<s%>, as doth thy people <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that this <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

If thy <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against their <S%H341>enemy<s%>, by <S%H1870>whatsoever<s%> way thou shalt <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6419>them<s%>, and they pray unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> which thou hast <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>;
then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause<s%>.

If they <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H120>thee<s%> (for there is no man that <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> <S%H599>not<s%>), and thou be angry with <S%H5414>them<s%>, and deliver them to the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, so that they carry them <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7617>captive<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, <S%H7350>far<s%> off or <S%H7138>near<s%>;

yet if they shall <S%H7725>bethink<s%> themselves in the <S%H776>land<s%> whither they are carried <S%H7617>captive<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H2603>again<s%>, and make supplication unto thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> of them that carried them <S%H7617>captive<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and have done <S%H5753>perversely<s%>, we have dealt <S%H7561>wickedly<s%>;

if they <S%H7725>return<s%> unto thee with all their <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all their <S%H5315>soul<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, who carried them <S%H7617>captive<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto thee <S%H1870>toward<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>, which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> which thou hast <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>:
